about_the_game:
After being in development for over three years, South Scrimshaw Part One released early last month to an unexpectedly enthusiastic audience. This art book is a way for newfound fans to see more of the project and provide financial support to the free visual novel.



Over 200 pages, 4K resolution, the book gives a brief survey of the project's evolution, contains art not present in the VN, and shows select illustrations broken down into component parts.



📗🐳 After installation 🐳 📗
After purchasing and installing the DLC, the PDF artbook will be in the root folder where South Scrimshaw Part One is installed.

To find this folder, right click South Scrimshaw Part One in your Steam Library and select "Properties". Under the "Installed Files" tab, select "Browse...". In the folder you will find a file titled TheArtOfSouthScrimshaw.pdf

Thank you to everyone who has viewed South Scrimshaw. These last three weeks have been beyond anything I had anticipated.



"South Scrimshaw is made possible through the support of viewers like you. Thank you."
